The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#12134](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/12134.html) (Build previous releases and run functional
Strong concept ACK\n\nWe really should test under all sanitizers in Travis â€“ thanks for taking a step in that direction! :-)
What tests are blocking the removal of `RUN_FUNCTIONAL_TESTS=false`?\n\nCan these be handled using suppressions instead?
I don't think this works. AFAIK wildcard paths are not allowed and this won't be expanded as intended.
Also move from `contrib/sanitizers-ubsan.suppressions` to `test/sanitizer_suppressions/ubsan` to make it consistent across sanitizers?
If there is only one folder that matches the wildcard, it should be properly expanded?\n\nHowever, I just went and reverted that hunk.
They also need to be identified, which is the tricky part and imo better be suited for another pull request. (See my WIP in the suppressions file)

@MarcoFalke No, the preceding `$PATH:` part prevents expansion:

```
$ mkdir testing
$ ls -d testin*
testing
$ TESTING=foo/:testin*
$ echo $TESTING
foo/:testin*
$ TESTING=testin*
$ echo $TESTING
testing
```

:-)
